unnormalised: Remember to always use strong passwords with >12 characters, including symbols like @ and numbers, and enable 2FA wherever possible to protect your accounts from being hacked. Also, beware of phishing emails asking for your OTP.
normalised: Remember to always use strong passwords with greater than twelve characters, including symbols like at and numbers, and enable two F-A wherever possible to protect your accounts from being hacked. Also, beware of phishing emails asking for your O-T-P.
